Class MainMenuCLI

java.lang.Object

public class MainMenuCLI extends Object
The Class MainMenuCLI. The command line interface for the main menu.

    • basicOptions

      public int basicOptions()
      Collect's what the monster would like to do
      Returns:
      the int, representing the option choosen

    • gameEnterContinue

      public void gameEnterContinue()
      A small function that just waits till the user presses enter. A way to break up the game so everything doesn't happen all at once.

    • gameGetIntEnter

      public int gameGetIntEnter(int maxNumber)
      Queries the user for a number input between 0 and maxNumber or no input
      Parameters:
      maxNumber - , the max number the user can input
      Returns:
      the int, or 0 for no input

    • viewGameInfo

      public void viewGameInfo()
      Outputs the current game statistics.

      Allow's a user to rename one of their monsters

    • startNewMonsterName

      public String startNewMonsterName()
      Collect's the monsters new name from the user This method only executed if the user has selected to rename their monster
      Returns:
      the string, the monster's new name

    • userGameOver

      public void userGameOver(int gameEndReason)
      Occurs when the game is over. Different endings depending on how the game ends
      Parameters:
      gameEndReason - , an int relating to which ending has occurred

    • randomEvent

      public void randomEvent()
      Method is called when player decides to sleep. Interacts with the random event class to decide if a random event has occurred overnight If a random event happens or not, the player is informed

    • startNewGame

      public void startNewGame()
      Starts new game by caling the Setup command line interface

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      Just a bunch of if/else if checking user inputs, the game day only advances after sleep is chosen. If the user has no monsters left, check if the user can buy a new monster If they can't afford one the game ends, this is checked everytime the user goes back to the main menu OR game ends when current day is passed maximum number of days
